title: Can´t start launcher since today`s update

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Hello, maybe someone in the forums can help me. 
First of all I seem to have quite a lot of problems with the new launcher since they made the new client the standart one. Had to reinstall my league everytime a new update came out, because the launcher simply bugsplattet whenever I tried to start it.
Now I´ve reinstalled it (once again) and now after getting it to download everything i try to create a custom to see if it works. League simply shuts down and now this error msg keeps appearing whenever I try to open it.

Can anyone help me? Or does anyone have similar issues`?

replies.body:
I'm thinking your PC security settings or antivirus may be off and blocking your game files from installing properly with each update.  Before moving forward, I recommend going through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to prevent cases like this in the future.

Once League has been added to your exceptions, grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a clean reinstall to fix up these bad files and re-update.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Thanks, will try to do so

It's possible that you need to complete a clean reinstallation of League in order to resolve the issue. Grab Riot's [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and check both the box for 'Reinstall' and 'Clean Uninstall', then hit the Start button. This will wipe all files associated with League to ensure corruption doesn't carry over, then reinstalls the game.
 
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d2/Annie_HextechSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160224210722
 
Let us know if your issue is resolved or not.
